channel.title: RFD Minigame
channel.description: How do i add a portal so people can enter it and go in and kill the monsters for my rfd minigame on a 317?

item.title: RFD Minigame
item.dc:creator: @Venge_Drop Venge Drop
item.description:
@Venge_Drop wrote:

if (inRFD()) {
getPA().movePlayer(1899,5363, playerId * 4+2);
sendMessage(“Your wave will start in 10 seconds.”);
EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() {
public void execute(EventContainer c) {
Server.rfd.spawnNextWave((Client)Server.playerHandler.players[playerId]);
c.stop();
}
}, 10000);

Thats all i have in client.java about the rfd minigame.

Read full topic

item.title: RFD Minigame
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

In client.java look for

under it add

case ####: //id of the object if(actionTimer == 0) { teleportToX = ####; //Where to teleport teleportToY = ####; //where to teleport sendMessage("Welcome to the RFD Minigame!"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; actionTimer = 5; } break;
